TextView.android:text: Certificate of Live Birth for Out-Of Town Services
Process of Delayed Registration of Certificate of Live Birth born outside the Municipality.

- Father or Mother
- Relative
- Guardian
- Himself/ Herself
1. Philippine Statistics Authority or Municipal Civil Registry Office
2. Certification from the barangay (1 original copy)
3. Philippine Statistics Authority or Municipal Civil Registry Office
4. Philippine Statistics Authority or Municipal Civil Registry Office
5. Barangay Treasurer or Municipal Treasurer’s Office
10. Attorney or Municipal Civil Registry Office
11. Attorney or Municipal Civil Registry Office
1. Submit requirement to the receiving clerk
1.1. Receive and check the veracity of the submitted documents

2.1. Interview the client/informant

2.2. Authenticate the supporting papers

2.3. Process/ type the COLB.
3.1. Let the customer sign the informant’s portion and the Affidavit of Corroboration.\n\n3.2. Issue pay slip to the client for the payment of processing fee.
5. Present the OR to the Receiving Clerk

5.1. Attached the OR and present the documents to the MCR for the signature

5.2. Affix seal

5.3. Segregate the documents.
6.1. Instruct the client for the approval of the documents.\n\n6.2. Forward the accomplished COLB to the concern City/Municipal Civil Registrar for the approval.
7. Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) and drop it in the feedback box
7.1. Request Client to Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) form in the feedback box
